mapper.select: SELECT P.BKNO, TITLE, AUTHORS, TRANSLATORS, PUBLISHER, TO_CHAR(DATETIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS DATETIME, THUMBNAIL, CONTENTS, PRICE, STATUS, P.ISBN, TO_CHAR(L.LOANSABLEDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') LOANSABLEDATE FROM TBL_POSSESSION P JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON P.ISBN = B.ISBN LEFT JOIN (SELECT BKNO, CASE WHEN STATUS IN (0,4) THEN REDATE+14 WHEN STATUS IN (5,6) THEN RDDATE END LOANSABLEDATE FROM TBL_LOANS ORDER BY LNO DESC) L ON P.BKNO = L.BKNO WHERE P.BKNO = #{bkno} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT PS.BKNO, PS.STATUS, (SELECT TO_CHAR(L.LOANSABLEDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') FROM TBL_POSSESSION P LEFT JOIN (SELECT BKNO, CASE WHEN STATUS IN (0,4) THEN REDATE+14 WHEN STATUS IN (5,6) THEN RDDATE END LOANSABLEDATE FROM TBL_LOANS ORDER BY LNO DESC) L ON P.BKNO = L.BKNO WHERE P.BKNO = PS.BKNO AND ROWNUM = 1) LOANSABLEDATE FROM TBL_POSSESSION PS WHERE ISBN = #{isbn} ORDER BY 1
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_POSSESSION SET STATUS = #{status} WHERE BKNO = #{bkno}
mapper.select: SELECT J.BKNO, B.TITLE, B.THUMBNAIL, P.ISBN FROM TBL_POSSESSION P JOIN ( SELECT BKNO, COUNT FROM (SELECT BKNO, COUNT(LNO) COUNT FROM TBL_LOANS WHERE LDATE > SYSDATE-7 GROUP BY BKNO ORDER BY 2 DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 7 ) J ON P.BKNO = J.BKNO JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON P.ISBN = B.ISBN ORDER BY J.COUNT DESC

SELECT P.BKNO, B.TITLE, B.THUMBNAIL, B.ISBN FROM TBL_BOOK B JOIN ( SELECT ISBN, BKNO, REGDATE FROM (SELECT BKNO, ISBN, REGDATE FROM TBL_POSSESSION ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 7 ) P ON B.ISBN = P.ISBN ORDER BY P.REGDATE DESC
